about_the_game:
Lord of Metal is a single player story-driven management simulator game about organizing Rock music festivals bringing a dystopian world back to life. Gather your crew, book bands, sign sponsors, claim festival grounds and bring some Rock to the masses!

In Lord of Metal, you're a disciple of the almighty Metal God, tasked with reviving the world's passion for hard rock and metal. To achieve your goal, you need to host festivals going from small roadside gigs to mega events for thousands of fans.

Get ‘under the hood’ of heavy music industry: gather your crew, book bands, land sponsors, build & manage fests and make decisions that matter. Travel the vibrant world of the game and enjoy the stories and mechanics based on real music industry experience brought to you by pros.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
